description:
This 3 bedroom apartment  in Bushwick, Brooklyn is perfect for families wishing to reside in a residential New York City neighborhood, while keeping close proximity to Manhattan. The home features hard wood floors and a fully equipped, eat-in kitchen with ample cabinetry. Living room 1 includes a full-sized futon and flat-screen cable television for comfortable indoor entertainment and additional bedding.
Additionally you may walk to Halsey Street / Wyckoff Avenue, offering the L train
name: 3 Bedroom Cozy Apartmnet
review: The place is great enough  space for our family of 6 .. 10 mins from the L train and 2 mins  from the buses.plenty of stores nearby and a park .If you  have a car be prepared to park far from  the home .. various times you can find parking..  other times you cant ..  Overall We loved the place ..Thank Viviana
